description:
Keep the weather on the outside. This waterproof anorak is tailored for a life of paddle-toting. Made with lightweight and breathable fabric, it offers a full range of motion for drawing, sweeping and prying without restriction. The hood features a flexible stiff brim that you can shape around your face, with drawcords to cinch in excess volume.

  • 40-denier face nylon fabric has a DWR coating to shed precipitation and water
  • HyproTex 2.5-layer fabric is lightweight, waterproof and breathable
  • Hood has multiple adjustment points with a flexible stiff brim
  • 1/2 front water-tight zipper lets you vent or seal out the weather
  • Gripped cuffs are adjustable with Velcro® tabs
  • Gripped hem is adjustable with drawcord
  • 2 zippered sleeve pockets
name: NRS High Tide Jacket - Men's
